title: Does U.S. Rep. Ocasio-Cortez Oppose Daylight Saving Time Because It Speeds Up Climate Change?
subtitle: Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has proposed a number of ideas to combat global warming.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said that she opposed daylight saving time because “the extra hour of sunlight drastically speeds up climate change.”
